It works, you need to set the IOS to 223 (not 222), also make sure that the VIDTV patch is set to "ON".  I am using USB loader GX so I dont know about Wii Flow.  And it worked with my WBFS just fine, I thought it was weird that the scrubbed file size ended up being .06 GB, but thats just how small it is :) .

WAY better than worms a space oddity, that game was a turd.  This uses a power bar instead of flinging the remote, and moving around is easier, and there are more weapons.
